## Features  

### Game Modes
- âœ… **Classic Mode** ğŸ² â€“ Turn-based gameplay **(1-4 players, local multiplayer ğŸ“)**
- âœ… **Time Attack** â³ â€“ Race against the clock
- âœ… **Head-to-Head** âš”ï¸ â€“ Direct matchups
  - âœ… **Round-Robin format** ğŸ’¯
  - âœ… **Knockout format** ğŸ†
- âœ… **Custom Mode** ğŸ¨ â€“ Tailor your own game mode
  - âœ… **Category Selection** ğŸ­ â€“ Choose quiz categories
  - âœ… **Adjustable Question Quantity** â“ â€“ Set the number of questions
  - âœ… **Difficulty Levels** ğŸšï¸ â€“ Customise difficulty settings
  - âœ… **Points System** ğŸ¯ â€“ Configure scoring rules
  - âœ… **Time Limits** â±ï¸ â€“ Modify round duration
- ğŸ”œ **Online Play** ğŸŒ â€“ Challenge friends & family remotely


### Special Features
- âœ… **Adult Mode** ğŸ» â€“ Mature-themed questions & drinking forfeits **(18+ Only! ğŸ”)**
- âœ… **Maltese-Themed Questions** ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡¹ â€“ Dive into Malta's history, culture & tradition
- âœ… **Facts** ğŸ’¡ â€“ Discover & learn interesting additional facts

## Instructions
To run **React** front-end (\trivya\trivya_frontend):
<code>yarn dev</code>

To run **Node.js** back-end (\trivya\trivya_apiserver):
<code>yarn dev</code>
<br>
